name: 艾莉森·雷曼
introduction: Overview (2)Nickname	 AllieHeight	 5' 5" (1.65 m)Mini Bio (1)Allison was raised in Teaneck, NJ. She received her B.A. from Wesleyan University and earned her Masters of Fine Arts in Dramatic Arts from The University of San Diego/ The Old Globe.Allison works frequently in New York and regional theatre. She made her Broadway debut in Living On Love (2015) understudying Veep's Anna Chlumsky.She has a recurring role on the upcoming Hulu/Universal series, The Path.
